main event: A bright, large circular flying object was observed hovering and then rapidly climbing to the north over Mackenzie Bay, Alaska on March 31, 1960, along with three smaller objects.
interesting points: The main object was described as bright and large, The sighting lasted for 5 minutes, The three smaller objects followed a similar pattern as the main object, There was no verification of the sighting, but data was available for evaluation, The sighting was a ground-visual observation.
sighted object: a bright, large circular flying object and three smaller objects
